snippet.title: SWIV (AMIGA - FULL GAME)
snippet.description:
Zeus presents Swiv (aka Silkworm IV) (un-emulated) for the Amiga A500, a true classic from the golden era of amiga gaming which must not be forgotten alongside the software house and all programmers that were involved in making this game.

Year of release: 1991

The un-official follow-up to the fantastic shooter Silkworm on the amiga.
They took Silkworm, revamped it with a bigger playing field, a different view and one large level instead of multiple short ones.
Again, loved hearing these large explosions coming through my hi-fi!
Sadly because of youtube's 25 frame rate, the immense white flashing that happens when you kill the penultimate boss (44:08 - 44:26) only shows up grey on this upload, it looks crazy on the real amiga hardware when playing it :-)
I used the infinite lives & keep weapons cheats from the trainer menu and started with multiple weapon "3 spread" with speed "4" as the game starts a bit slow with normal fire power, I could have used firepower "5 spread" to start with but it would make the game look too easy and not enjoyable to watch.
Included is the full title & high-score music.

Spectrum full game: http://youtu.be/ZiHlEgetnVw

Hope all you Amiga fans enjoy this upload.

Please note: NONE of my game uploads are emulated in any way whatsoever, they are 100% original recordings by myself taken directly from the original hardware the game was intended for, that way you know you're watching the real thing.
I will also always state weather i am using any cheats in the game, if not mentioned then i am not using any.
Check out my channel (http://www.youtube.com/user/ZEUSDAZ/videos), dedicated to gamers who loved the games of yesteryear.

Switch to 480p for best video quality and feel free to leave comments on my channel and vid's.

Keeping the memory of the Amiga and it's cool games alive!!!
